What more could you want?

programme.title: Strippers: Cars for Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. To win this week our teams will have to live the American dream as they try to hunt down an affordable Yank Tank to strip for parts. Scarce on British roads, glamorous American marques such as Chevrolet, Dodge and Cadillac are famous for big gutsy engines and impressive straight line speed. The teams would love to pick up a bargain but will they be able to find a heap of American Muscle before stripping begins?

programme.title: Supercar Megabuild
programme.desc: In this episode of Supercar Megabuild, engineers Ralph and Ranen are being put into the deep freeze. Their mentor, car designer, Afzal Kahn has been contacted by a client and friend, asking him to produce a vehicle capable of surviving winter conditions, taking on difficult terrain…and crossing deep snow. To complete their mission, Ralph and Ranen begin by testing out the vehicle given to them by their boss – a comfortable, conservative executive saloon – the Audi A8. Putting it through its paces at an indoor ski centre, they show this vehicle has a long way to go before it can stand up to the clients brief. The subsequent adventure takes Ranen to the alps where he learns about the adaptations needed to take a car "off piste" and Ralph to the Scottish highlands, where he gets to grips with the treacherous terrain the Audi will need to take on. Before the car is revealed to the client in a spectacular finale, Ralph and Ranen modify the engine to withstand sub arctic conditions of minus 40 degrees c, fit bespoke tracks to the four corners of the vehicle and a snow plough so it can crash through even the deepest snow! To make sure this beast of a vehicle stands out from the crowd even more, Designer Afzal Kahn gives the cars styling a complete overhaul.

programme.title: King Fishers
programme.desc: In this humorous hour-long format we pitch three passionate fishermen, from three different countries to discover who is the King Fisher. In the ultimate clash of fishing styles and cultures Aussie Outback boy, Shane takes on OZ, Thailands "Bangkok Hooker" and the UKs Barbel King Jason. But this competition isn't just about who catches the most and who catches the biggest. It's also about who hosts the ultimate fishing trip with marks for both fish caught and the whole experience contributing to the final score. In this episode three different fishing disciplines clash in the ultimate fishing competition: lure fishing in Australia, deep cover fishing in Thailand and bait fishing in the UK.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Master mechanics Fuzz Townshend and parts-blagging petrol head Tim Shaw are back for a brand new season of the fan favourite show Car S.O.S. The comedy duo have their work-cut out as they embark on more undercover missions rescuing classic cars and returning them in a surprise reveal to their much deserving owners. This season starts with a exhaust bang, as Tim and Fuzz are on a special mission to rescue a unique classic racing car and reunite it with a true racing legend...Sir Stirling Moss! But this 1962 Austin Healy Sebring Sprite, that once raced in a team that included Sir Stirling Moss, isn't in a fit state. But the guys have a plan to get this car back on the racetrack and Sir Stirling Moss back in the driving seat. Fuzz begins work in the garage whilst Tim goes in search of the original engine, and also finding time along the way to have a sit down with the racing legend himself. Will the Sprite be ready in time for Sir Stirling Moss to take it out for a spin? The guys also come across a supercar that's begging to be taken back to the swinging '60s, the Jaguar E-type. But the car's owner Mick is suffering from osteoporosis and has lost all hope that his beloved car will ever be back to its full glory. But Tim and Fuzz are working with Mick's family in secret to restore the car and give Mick a brilliant surprise. But when they discover it's a back to metal restoration this car looks like it's going to be more of a head-ache than a head-turner. Other cars festering away waiting for the guy's attention are Tim's all-time favourite: the Audi Quattro Turbo, the 3 wheeled 1934 Morgan F4, a retro 1982 Mk1 GTI and a 1995 Nissan Skyline GTR. So start up those engines, as Tim and Fuzz return this month for the ultimate car show with a heart.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: Its a game changer going into week ten of the bluefin season when the quota drops from three fish to one fish per day. As the pressure mounts to catch, FV-Tuna.com and Wicked Pissah stick with their long-range strategies to fish inshore while Fish Hawk and Hot Tuna roll the dice and continue to fish offshore. Pinwheel completely changes strategy and chooses to fish closer to home while Falcon bets it all to go a great distance for one fish.

programme.title: Airport Security: Rome
programme.desc: When the Pope arrives at Fiumicino airport, much drama ensues. The Italian anti-narcotics police find heroin hidden on the shoes of a man traveling from Belgium. Three Bangladeshi passengers may be travelling on fake passports and police must uncover their true identity. A Turkish couple are in danger of missing their daughter's wedding when they can't find one of their passports. A man arriving from London begs police not to search his bag.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz travel to Manchester to secretly steal away Stephen's 1983 Citroen 2CV, a quirky French economy car that was once the pride and joy of owner Stephen. When the boys arrive to steal the car away they discover that it has been stripped down to its component parts and looks more like a jigsaw than a car. Owner Stephen has been suffering from stage 4 throat cancer and his family hope that getting his 2CV back on the road will help give him a new lease of life.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Banged Up Abroad is a British docudrama television series following stories of people who have been arrested while travelling abroad. It seems like you are watching a blood-freezing thriller, except for it is based on real events and real people. You'll see how a trip to paradise can turn into hell and end up in prison in an unknown country and it will make your hair stand. People get into troubles for trying to smuggle drugs, sometimes they are kidnapped or captured. The series is a mixture of interviews with the real people and actors reconstructing the events. We find out what it is like to be in prison abroad, without help and money, not knowing the language, and what are the terrible consequences for the family members. The series is a warning for all careless tourists, it shows vividly how easy and fast it is to hit rock bottom.

programme.title: Airport Security: Brazil
programme.desc: Federal Police at Sao Paolo International Airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. Their main threat, cocaine smuggling. A woman is caught trafficking cocaine inside packets of hair bleach. When she's hit with a dramatic fainting spell, officers fear the worst. Agents uncover nearly three kilos of cocaine inside photos of the Pope. And a man who attempted to run from police is arrested, his luggage lined with cocaine.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route from Bogota to the tiny Caribbean island of San Andres, Aires Flight 8250 is rocked by a major tropical storm. And though the crew expects to emerge from the intense weather, they are pummeled by high winds and heavy rains on their final approach and slam into the ground just short of the runway. The pilots claim the weather is to blame, but investigators ultimately reveal the cause of the accident was in their heads.

programme.title: Airport Security: Rome
programme.desc: When the Pope arrives at Fiumicino airport, much drama ensues. The Italian anti-narcotics police find heroin hidden on the shoes of a man traveling from Belgium. Three Bangladeshi passengers may be travelling on fake passports and police must uncover their true identity. A Turkish couple are in danger of missing their daughter's wedding when they can't find one of their passports. A man arriving from London begs police not to search his bag.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: A fascinating documentary series from National Geographic exploring Europe from above. Although only the second-smallest continent on our planet, Europe is packed full of diverse wildlife, cities, countries, politics and history. From this unique perspective, viewers can see the culturally rich continent like they never have before, with cameras in the sky offering a stunning examination of these beautiful lands. Each episode in this six-part series focusses on a respective country, with those explored in this series being the Netherlands, Italy, Germany, Spain, the United Kingdom and Poland. Narrated by Julian Barratt.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls
programme.desc: Survivalist Bear Grylls returns to the wild with some of Hollywood's most beloved celebrities for a new season of his outdoor adventure series. From Marvel superheroes to award winning entertainers, a new guest joins Bear each week for a no-holds-barred journey through some of the most extreme environments in the world. Together, they must rely on bush craft techniques to survive each dangerous location while pushing through both mental and physical limits to brave even the most challenging obstacles.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they don't happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Transporting military cargo in a converted Boeing 747, National Airlines Flight 102 takes off from Bagram Airfield in Afghanistan. But within seconds, the suddenly uncontrollable plane stalls and crashes to the ground. The accident is captured by a passing dashcam, and though the footage first leads investigators to an obvious conclusion, an overlooked piece of evidence eventually tells them they were dead wrong about the cause.

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Join survival and wilderness expert Hazen Audel as he pushes his skills to the limit in a series of challenging adventures around the globe. This documentary series tracks Hazen's exploits following the road less travelled where the terrain and elements can prove to be harsh and unstable. Along the way, he visits local communities and quizzes the native residents about the surrounding territory to help him on his arduous journey. Episodes feature such rigorous expeditions as following in the footsteps of the Embera tribe of Panama and Colombia to trek through the jungle of the Darien Gap; navigating the Arctic Circle accompanied by 200 reindeer; and traversing lakes infested with crocodiles.

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Join survival and wilderness expert Hazen Audel as he pushes his skills to the limit in a series of challenging adventures around the globe. This documentary series tracks Hazen's exploits following the road less travelled where the terrain and elements can prove to be harsh and unstable. Episodes feature such rigorous expeditions as following in the footsteps of the Embera tribe of Panama and Colombia to trek through the jungle of the Darien Gap; navigating the Arctic Circle accompanied by 200 reindeer; and traversing lakes infested with crocodiles.

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Hazen Audel embarks on a challenging jungle mission, based on a traditional solo jungle trek made by young men of the Embera tribe. Hazen will leave behind the safety of the Embera tribal village and journey in to the heart of one of the world's most hostile and challenging environments – the rainforests of the notorious Darien Gap. On his multi-day challenge Hazen must cross rivers, dark jungles and scale mountains if he is to reach his final destination of the Pacific coast.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim & Fuzz head to Southampton on a mission to rescue a Beetle called Boris that almost bankrupted its owner. With Boris back at base the boys uncover some truly awful repairs and shocking rust which means a lot panels get replaced, it also means they can give the old bug a new look with sloping headlamps and retro bumpers but, as ever, they dont see eye to eye on the details. To add to the makeover mix a graphic artist is commissioned to reinvent Boris wacky paint job for a laid back new life with its surfer owner. The piece de resistance is a wind up reveal in which the poor owner is told his tired old bug is vandalized, the truth, of course, is quite the reverse.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: In Blue's Clues & You, beloved puppy Blue invites viewers to join her and Josh on a clue-led adventure to solve a puzzle. With each paw print, the viewer is inspired to interact with Josh and Blue to figure out Blue's Clues!

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: The owner of Butterbean's Cafe in the magical land of Puddlebrook is fairy Butterbean. Her cafe is a very comfortable and warm place, popular for its various dishes- cakes, pancakes, cookies, banana bread, salads cooked by herself, her friends Poppy, Dazzle, Jasper and her sister Poppy. Friends use extraordinary cooking appliances and a magic secret ingredient, that is why everything is so special and yummy. Their jealous rival is Ms. Marmalady, things are not going great at her cafe so she desperately wants to put Butterbean out of business. But true friendship and friends' support can conquer evil.

programme.title: Barbapapa – One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family. Each 11 minute episode will take a lead from Michael Bond's original books and, with the spirit of the new Paddington movies, tell brand new Paddington stories in an exciting new animated form. The show will appeal to both children and adults alike – adults will recognise the Paddington they know and love, and young children will discover him for the first time. The show is heavily influenced by the Paddington Feature Films but a key difference is the characters especially the Brown family have been aged down, more of a young family starting out than the comfortable middle aged ones we see in the films.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: PAW Patrol is a preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Zuma, Rubble, and Skye, who are led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder. With a unique blend of problem-solving skills, cool vehicles and lots of cute doggy humor, the PAW Patrol works together on high-stakes rescue missions to protect the Adventure Bay community.From Marshall the firedog to Chase the police pup to Skye, who flies high in her copter, each pup brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. They all have special Pup Packs on their backs to help them handle anything – from rescuing kittens to saving a train from a rockslide! And no matter how big the adventure, the PAW Patrol always has time for a game, a laugh, and an ear scratch from Ryder.Fun PAW Patrol Fact: Ryder rescued all the pups and taught them their PAW Patrol skills.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: For Halloween Lincoln and Clyde have scoped out a fancy neighborhood to make their dreams of scoring full size candy bars a reality. Meanwhile, Lucy is putting on a haunted maze and the younger girls scheme to get maximum candy.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: To get Lily to stop crying the kids give her an old singing toy from the attic but it quickly drives them crazy. Dad declares war on the kids' devices so they decide to show Dad how great electronics and the internet are.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn are quadruplets with only two things in common: their birthday and parents. This dynamic foursome battle sibling rivalry at every turn, but in the end when they are together, nothing can stop them.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn are quadruplets with only two things in common: their birthday and parents. This dynamic foursome battle sibling rivalry at every turn, but in the end when they are together, nothing can stop them.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Young Dylan's grandmother decides to send him to live indefinitely with her affluent son's family. The Wilson family household is soon turned upside down as lifestyles clash between aspiring hip hop star and his straight-laced cousins.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family? Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: City Adventures
programme.desc: Welcome to LEGO City. A modern metropolis filled with the fiercest firefighters, the cream of the crop cops, and so many BLOCKHEADS. Every citizen will assemble together for the most awesomely awesome adventures.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn are quadruplets with only two things in common: their birthday and parents. This dynamic foursome battle sibling rivalry at every turn, but in the end when they are together, nothing can stop them.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn are quadruplets with only two things in common: their birthday and parents. This dynamic foursome battle sibling rivalry at every turn, but in the end when they are together, nothing can stop them.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Young Dylan's grandmother decides to send him to live indefinitely with her affluent son's family. The Wilson family household is soon turned upside down as lifestyles clash between aspiring hip hop star and his straight-laced cousins.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack
programme.desc: Ollie's Pack is an animated comedy about Ollie, a 13-year old boy who, with the help of his best buddies Cleo and Bernie and monster trainer Captain Wowski, protects and controls a backpack portal to the world of monsters.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Goldie's Oldies
programme.desc: After her attempts to woo Shawn go disastrously wrong, Goldie tries to save face by pretending she has a boyfriend. But when Danny brings her made-up sweetheart to life, Goldie is forced to go on an excruciating double date to keep up the pretence.

programme.title: Pipars cepās
programme.desc: 6.epizode. Grila sezona uzņem apgriezienus un aizvien vairāk cilvēku plāno nedēļas nogalēs pagatavot ko īpašu. Kas gan var būt kārdinošāks par grilēta ēdiena smaržu, kas virmo gaisā? Ikdienišķa maltīte kļūs par svētkiem, ja to pārvērtīsiet kopīgā grilēšanas pasākumā dārzā, piemājas terasē vai pie dabas krūts.

programme.title: Koncerts "Aizvestajiem" 1941.gada 14.jūnija deportācijas upuru piemiņai
programme.desc: Latvijas Radio koris, diriģents Sigvards Kļava. Šogad aprit 80 gadi kopš liktenīgā 1941. gada 14. jūnija, kad uz Sibīriju tika aizdzītas mātes ar maziem bērniem, bet tēvi tika nošauti vai mira bada nāvē Gulaga nometnēs. Mēs neesam aizmirsuši no Latvijas aizvestos bērnus, kuri nosala, nomira badā, zaudēja tēvus un mātes, brāļus un māsas. Bērnus, kuri izdzīvoja un atgriezās, bet viņus izsūtīja vēlreiz. Atgriezās tikai daļa izsūtīto. Cilvēki tika iznīcināti vai asimilēti. Lai Jūsu pārdzīvotais vienmēr paliktu nākamo paaudžu atmiņā, fonds Sibīrijas bērni organizē konferences un koncertus, bērnu zīmējumu un sacerējumu konkursus, katru gadu rīkojam ekspedīcijas uz Sibīriju, veidojam filmas un ceļojošās izstādes, izdodam grāmatas.

programme.title: Mājā un sētā
programme.desc: 2.sezona, 15.epizode. Ar padomiem, pieredzes stāstiem gan lauciniekiem, gan pilsētniekiem, ikvienam, kuram ir interese par dārza darbiem un savas dzīves vides uzlabošanu. Šajā sezonā akcentēsim zaļo dzīvesveidu, kā dzīvot veselīgāk, saimniekot taupīgāk un videi draudzīgāk.

programme.title: Pielaiko telpu, māju, dārzu
programme.desc: Vērtīgu padomu un ideju raidījums, kurā tiek apskatītas visdažādākās tēmas, kas saistītas ar dzīvokļa, balkona, mājas, piemājas teritorijas un dārza labiekārtošanu, apzaļumošanu, dizainu. Raidījuma mērķis ir iedvesmot un uzrunāt ikvienu, kas vēlas uzlabot dzīves kvalitāti, mudinot uz rīcību.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas 19.00
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos – ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Aktuāli šodien un rīt
programme.desc: 2.epizode. Mazie un vidējie uzņēmumi – kāda ir to nākotne Latvijā? Raidījuma vadītāja Anda Pēkšēna, kurai ir 20 gadu vadības pieredze uzņēmējdarbībā, kopā ar dažādu nozaru ekspertiem un prasmju treneriem sniegs skaidru redzējumu mazo un vidējo uzņēmumu vadītājiem: kā saglabāt biznesu šodien, kā pastāvēt rīt, kā šodien ir jāmaina komunikācijas veids ar patērētāju, kā vadīt komandu, esošās izmaiņas nodokļu segmentā un citi svarīgi jautājumi, kas ir nozīmīgi ikvienam uzņēmējam.

programme.title: Zaļā gaisma
programme.desc: Jaunākās satiksmes aktualitātes un izbrauciens ar slavenību.

programme.title: Брат за брата
programme.desc: Такие кварталы, как Гарлем, раньше можно было увидеть только в голливудских боевиках. Никто не думал, что они могут появиться и у нас. Гарлем – настоящее гетто в одном из крупных российских городов. Здесь почти открыто торгуют наркотиками и перепродают краденое. Школьные учителя боятся своих учеников, ведь те способны убить за плохую оценку. Местные стражи правопорядка не рискуют в позднее время суток лишний раз появляться на его улицах, а жители так привыкли к установленным правилам игры, что кажется, ничто и никогда не сможет заставить их иначе смотреть на происходящее вокруг.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Самые шокирующие гипотезы" – документальный проект телеканала РЕН ТВ. Мы дадим новые ответы на старые вопросы и зададим свои. Факты, о которых долго молчали наши коллеги-журналисты и независимая оценка событий, изменивших мир; расследования самых сенсационных историй и свежий взгляд на, казалось бы, общеизвестные исторические факты; поиск закономерностей и параллелей в самых невероятных явлениях нашей жизни, новости из всех областей человеческих знаний и загадки потаённых уголков нашего подсознания. Всё, что вас так долго интересовало, и всё, что может коснуться каждого из нас.

programme.title: Инспектор Купер
programme.desc: В Арсенале, одном из промышленных районов российской глубинки, живет Алексей Куприянов по прозвищу Купер. Его жизнь меняется после убийства друга — чтобы вести собственное расследование, и капитан Куприянов уходит из оперативного отдела, и становится участковым инспектором. В Арсенале все ему свое, родное: и бывшая жена со своими проблемами, и сын в переходном возрасте, и девушки-красавицы, и местные жители, которые обращаются к нему за помощью, и даже бандиты, терроризирующие городок. Но Купер не из робких, и точно знает, как со всем этим справиться…

programme.title: Запретная любовь
programme.desc: Сельская история о любовных перипетиях между двумя молодыми семьями, о сплоченности местных жителей, которые борются за свое село, которое хотят снести, чтобы построить на этом месте нефтеперерабатывающий завод. Подруги Оксана и Лариса живут в провинции и, на первый взгляд, каждая из них счастлива. У них есть любимые мужья, Лариса воспитывает дочь, а Оксана беременна долгожданным ребенком. Однако изнанка сельской идиллии оказывается страшной и таинственной. Когда-то давно Лариса приворожила своего мужа, который до сих пор влюблен в Оксану. Муж Оксаны уверен, что отец будущего ребенка – он, но все чаще слышит усмешки и пересуды односельчан. На фоне семейной драмы разыгрывается настоящая трагедия: село на грани разорения, местные жители боятся бандитов, все больше людей пропадает без вести. Потери не обходят стороной и главных героинь...

programme.title: Шеф
programme.desc: Виктор Расторгуев — полковник милиции — со всей семьей переезжает в Санкт-Петербург. В Москве он перешел дорогу некоему чиновнику и был вынужден уехать. Спокойно служить в Москве — ему бы уже не дали. В Питере Растогуев стал начальником РУВД в одном из районов города. Вместе с Растогуевым переехала его семья — жена Ольга и 16-летний сын Павел. Они пытаются освоиться на новом месте, но все в их жизни складывается не так, как бы они хотели…

programme.title: Онлайн
programme.desc: Типичную "блондинку" Лену в жизни устраивает абсолютно все: муж, находящийся на заработках в Португалии, все также позволяет тратить ей деньги и уже перестал пытаться тщетно ее контролировать и дал полную свободу действий. Поэтому, не теряя возможностей, все время Лена проводит с пользой и "по-максимуму" — тратит еще больше денег, смотрит еще больше видео, постит еще больше постов, френдит еще больше людей в соц.сетях и еще больше веселит зрителя, так как комичных ситуаций в ее жизни только прибавляется. Бедный ее муж Витя!

programme.title: Инспектор Купер
programme.desc: В Арсенале, одном из промышленных районов российской глубинки, живет Алексей Куприянов по прозвищу Купер. Его жизнь меняется после убийства друга — чтобы вести собственное расследование, и капитан Куприянов уходит из оперативного отдела, и становится участковым инспектором. В Арсенале все ему свое, родное: и бывшая жена со своими проблемами, и сын в переходном возрасте, и девушки-красавицы, и местные жители, которые обращаются к нему за помощью, и даже бандиты, терроризирующие городок. Но Купер не из робких, и точно знает, как со всем этим справиться…

programme.title: Один день, одна ночь
programme.desc: В подъезде дома, где живет Маня Поливанова, убит ее старый знакомый, накануне заходивший к ней поболтать. Деньги и ценности остались при нем, а он сам не был ни криминальным авторитетом, ни политиком, ни богачом. Так за что его убили? Алексу Шан-Гирею предстоит разобраться в очередном происшествии, в которое угодила его подруга

programme.title: Пападос-шоу
programme.desc: Юмористическая телепрограмма подарит телезрителям массу эмоций — от восторга до испуга. В каждом выпуске телешоу "Пападос шоу" собраны розыгрыши, снятые скрытой камерой в разных странах мира. Это нестандартные ситуации, вызывающие неожиданную реакцию прохожих. Камера фиксирует, как реагируют люди разного возраста на унитаз или душевую кабину в лифте, труп на улице или пленника в багажнике машины. Ведущие предлагают повторить пранки, а автор лучшего видео может получить приз от программы.

programme.title: Vēlais ar Streipu
programme.desc: Ikdienas satīrisko ziņu vakara šovs ar Kārli Streipu, kurā tiek apskatītas un analizētas dažādas sabiedrībā aktuālas tēmas.

programme.title: Preses klubs
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums, kurā raidījuma vadītājs ar trim viesiem apspriež konkrētās dienas aktualitātes.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Philippe Cousteau Jr., grandson of the legendary Jacques Cousteau, explores the most breath-taking places on the earth. Documentary TV series Xploration Awesome Planet takes you on incredible journey around our unique planet to experience its outstanding power and beauty. Philippe uses unbeatable combination of passion, deep knowledge and infectious enthusiasm to show us dynamic forces of earth, its miraculous wonders from the tops of the highest mountains to the depths of the oceans, various ecosystems, extreme weather, waterfalls and caves, geisers and glaciers, volcanoes and beaches of all colors of rainbow, various species of animals and birds and their habitats.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature
programme.desc: Naomi travels the world to find the worst nightmare of nature.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: Hey You! What If…
programme.desc: Hey You! What If...is a British children's series with a fun approach to get children interested in science. Each episode answers scientific questions, as the main character goes through impossible situations, with madcap experiments created by visual effects and motion graphics. Anything becomes real in this thought-provoking show, as possibilities of time travel, flat Earth and even a moon made of cheese are explored.

programme.title: Junior Vets
programme.desc: Six children get the opportunity to see what it is like to be a veterinarian first hand. The kids get to go to the University of Edinburgh to attend within the Royal School Of Veterinary Studies where they get to go into the veterinary hospitals and get involved in the real life cases. In hopes of inspiring the children about veterinary practices the kids get to get hands on in helping the ill animals and are taught how to get them back to health. Going through a range of challenges the children attend events, zoos and wildlife hospitals treating an array of animals. At the end of the series on of the participants will be crowned Head Vet for demonstrating excellent veterinary skills.

programme.title: Deadly Pole to Pole
programme.desc: Deadly Pole to Pole is a documentary series hosted by Steve Backshall, who travels pole to pole through the Americas while looking for the most dangerous animals. Join Steve and his deadliest adventure- 14-month voyage from the Arctic to the Antarctic via Alaska, California, Hawaii, Mexico and Brazil and many more amazing locations. Have a look at his meetings with white whales, ice bears, sharks, eagles, wolves, sea lions, eagles, crocodiles, snakes and spiders.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Strange Creatures is a documentary series dedicated to the majestic Animal Kingdom and its weirdest, most unusual creatures. Nature never stops surprising us with its unique species and evolutionary unlike living things. Have a look at species with extraordinary survival skills, animals who camouflage in a skillful way for different reasons, creatures that convincingly play dead, find out if a grasshopper can vomit. These and much more amazing facts about animals are there for you in Strange Creatures.

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: History Hunters documentary series let young viewers explore past civilizations and cultures, their heritage and its influence on future generations. It is a fun way for both parents and kids to learn history and discover its mysterious facts and events. Various chapters of history are there for you: from exploration of Vikings, including their myths, alphabet and foods, to the Mayan civilization, the culture of Europe's wide-ranging clans of Celts and life in the islands in the Pacific Ocean known collectively as Polynesia, and much more.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: We're Talking Animals
programme.desc: We're Talking Animals is a children's television series that provides eye opening and jaw dropping facts about all kinds of wildlife and farm animals. Accompanied by some stunning photography and footage of the animals in question. With hilarious asides from the animals themselves, this animal knowledge is coming straight from the horses mouth. Solidifying everything the episode has taught, MC Spider hosts an informative quiz about each segment the show has covered, finding the answers deep in his trusty web. This interactive extra keeps the show super engaging and fun.

programme.title: Danger! Wild Animals
programme.desc: Take a safari through the wilderness, visiting wildlife reserves, zoos and exotic locations that are home to some of the world's most interesting and dangerous species. Whether its an ostrich egg hatching or turtle being release into the wild, a rhino being weaned or an elephant being rescued from deadly minefields in Africa, this fast paced series uses some breathe taking footage. If that wasn't enough to capture your interest, it even takes a trip to some of the world's best breeding for conservation programs, encountering some adorable zoo babies.

programme.title: Hey You! What If…
programme.desc: Hey You! What If...is a British children's series with a fun approach to get children interested in science. Each episode answers scientific questions, as the main character goes through impossible situations, with madcap experiments created by visual effects and motion graphics. Anything becomes real in this thought-provoking show, as possibilities of time travel, flat Earth and even a moon made of cheese are explored.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Time-travelling and educational fun for kids. Andy works at the National Museum where he's responsible for the prehistoric exhibitions. He needs plenty of interesting items for his displays like dinosaur bones, feathers and things. Luckily for Andy, he has a time machine which means he can pop back to the prehistoric era, like the ice-age or the time of the dinosaurs and collect what he needs. Join Andy on his adventures back in time and learn about the creatures and beasts that lived on Earth millions of years ago. Starring Andy Day.

programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Danger! Wild Animals
programme.desc: Take a safari through the wilderness, visiting wildlife reserves, zoos and exotic locations that are home to some of the world's most interesting and dangerous species. Whether its an ostrich egg hatching or turtle being release into the wild, a rhino being weaned or an elephant being rescued from deadly minefields in Africa, this fast paced series uses some breathe taking footage. If that wasn't enough to capture your interest, it even takes a trip to some of the world's best breeding for conservation programs, encountering some adorable zoo babies.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature
programme.desc: Naomi travels the world to find the worst nightmare of nature.

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: History Hunters documentary series let young viewers explore past civilizations and cultures, their heritage and its influence on future generations. It is a fun way for both parents and kids to learn history and discover its mysterious facts and events. Various chapters of history are there for you: from exploration of Vikings, including their myths, alphabet and foods, to the Mayan civilization, the culture of Europe's wide-ranging clans of Celts and life in the islands in the Pacific Ocean known collectively as Polynesia, and much more.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Time-travelling and educational fun for kids. Andy works at the National Museum where he's responsible for the prehistoric exhibitions. He needs plenty of interesting items for his displays like dinosaur bones, feathers and things. Luckily for Andy, he has a time machine which means he can pop back to the prehistoric era, like the ice-age or the time of the dinosaurs and collect what he needs. Join Andy on his adventures back in time and learn about the creatures and beasts that lived on Earth millions of years ago. Starring Andy Day.

programme.title: We're Talking Animals
programme.desc: We're Talking Animals is a children's television series that provides eye opening and jaw dropping facts about all kinds of wildlife and farm animals. Accompanied by some stunning photography and footage of the animals in question. With hilarious asides from the animals themselves, this animal knowledge is coming straight from the horses mouth. Solidifying everything the episode has taught, MC Spider hosts an informative quiz about each segment the show has covered, finding the answers deep in his trusty web. This interactive extra keeps the show super engaging and fun.

programme.title: Junior Vets
programme.desc: Six children get the opportunity to see what it is like to be a veterinarian first hand. The kids get to go to the University of Edinburgh to attend within the Royal School Of Veterinary Studies where they get to go into the veterinary hospitals and get involved in the real life cases. In hopes of inspiring the children about veterinary practices the kids get to get hands on in helping the ill animals and are taught how to get them back to health. Going through a range of challenges the children attend events, zoos and wildlife hospitals treating an array of animals. At the end of the series on of the participants will be crowned Head Vet for demonstrating excellent veterinary skills.

programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!

programme.title: Penktasis kėlinys. Endesa krepšinio lygos apžvalga
Iššūkis sporto žvaigždei
programme.desc: SPORT1 televizija kartu su Sporto rėmimo fondu pristatė projektą "Iššūkis sporto žvaigždei 2020", kurio metu siekiama į aktyvų laisvalaikį įtraukti net tuos vaikus, kurie vietoje fizinio aktyvumo renkasi žalingus įpročius ar net netinkamą veiklą.

programme.title: Iššūkis sporto žvaigždei
programme.desc: SPORT1 televizija kartu su Sporto rėmimo fondu pristatė projektą "Iššūkis sporto žvaigždei 2020", kurio metu siekiama į aktyvų laisvalaikį įtraukti net tuos vaikus, kurie vietoje fizinio aktyvumo renkasi žalingus įpročius ar net netinkamą veiklą.

programme.title: Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Pirmos rungtynės
Penktasis kėlinys. Endesa krepšinio lygos apžvalga
Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Pirmos rungtynės
One Championship on TNT I. Mišrių kovos menų čempionatas
Raidījums "Vilciens Rīga – Valka. Atis Priedītis", atk.
99 франков
programme.desc: Октаву нет равных во вселенной: ведь он занимается рекламой! Это он решает, чего вам захочется завтра. Для него "человек – это такой же продукт, как и все остальные". Октав трудится в крупнейшем рекламном агентстве. У него полно денег, женщин и кокаина, но, тем не менее, его терзают сомнения. Две вещи в корне меняют жизнь Октава: роман с Софи, самой красивой сотрудницей агентства, и совещание в гигантском молочном концерне "Мадон" по поводу рекламного ролика. Октав срывается с катушек и решает взбунтоваться против системы, которая его породила, саботируя свою же рекламную кампанию.

programme.title: Преследование
programme.desc: Детектив лондонской городской полиции Колин Саттон выслеживает серийного убийцу.

programme.title: Джекпот
programme.desc: Испуганный и окровавленный, Оскар Свендсен просыпается с ружьём в руках в сомнительном заведении. Вокруг него 8 трупов и полиция, направляющаяся к нему. Оскар знает, что он невиновен. А всё началось с того, что четыре парня выиграли 1,7 миллиона в лотерею...

programme.title: 3 счастливых поросенка
programme.desc: Режиссер: Жан-Франсуа Пуле / -Тивьерж, Патрис Робитейлл, Софи Прегент. Реми, Матьё и Кристиан — братья, чья гиперактивность доставляет массу неприятностей им самим, их ревнивым женам и подружкам. Всё только усложняется, когда Доминик, жена Реми, выставляет мужа за дверь и не прочь завести интрижку с его братом...

programme.title: Амундсен
programme.desc: Молодой норвежский путешественник грезит об открытии неизведанных полярных земель. В погоне за мечтой и грандиозными свершениями герой жертвует всем: семейными узами, дружбой, любовью всей жизни. Получая взамен ледяные пустыни, бездонные трещины, нечеловеческий холод, метели и вечную мерзлоту.

programme.title: 99 франков
programme.desc: Октаву нет равных во вселенной: ведь он занимается рекламой! Это он решает, чего вам захочется завтра. Для него "человек – это такой же продукт, как и все остальные". Октав трудится в крупнейшем рекламном агентстве. У него полно денег, женщин и кокаина, но, тем не менее, его терзают сомнения. Две вещи в корне меняют жизнь Октава: роман с Софи, самой красивой сотрудницей агентства, и совещание в гигантском молочном концерне "Мадон" по поводу рекламного ролика. Октав срывается с катушек и решает взбунтоваться против системы, которая его породила, саботируя свою же рекламную кампанию.

programme.title: Мне по кайфу
programme.desc: Жаку скоро 50, но вместо приземлённых занятий и работы от заката до рассвета (как делают все его знакомые и родные) он одержим идеей разбогатеть, причём серьёзно и по-быстрому. И его совершенно не смущает тот факт, что пока всё, что у него есть, – это кипенно-белый халат и тапочки.

programme.title: Паразиты
programme.desc: Обычное корейское семейство Кимов жизнь не балует. Приходится жить в сыром грязном полуподвале, воровать интернет у соседей и перебиваться случайными подработками. Однажды друг сына семейства, уезжая на стажировку за границу, предлагает тому заменить его и поработать репетитором у старшеклассницы в богатой семье Пак. Подделав диплом о высшем образовании, парень отправляется в шикарный дизайнерский особняк и производит на хозяйку дома хорошее впечатление. Тут же ему в голову приходит необычный план по трудоустройству сестры.

programme.title: Война Мерфи
programme.desc: Хорошо поставленный, захватывающий боевик о войне, в котором наряду с батальными сценами дается психологический портрет английского моряка, который один остался в живых после того, как его судно оказалось потоплено немцами. Опираясь на помощь местного населения, после восстановления здоровья, он, одержимый местью, решает один напасть на немецкую армию, несмотря на то, что война уже закончилась...

programme.title: Планета Ка-Пэкс
programme.desc: В Манхэттенский психиатрический институт привозят странного человека в черных очках. Он зовет себя Протом и утверждает, что его родина – далекая планета Ка-Пэкс, откуда он мгновенно перенесся на Землю в луче света. Несмотря на все усилия, опытному доктору Пауэллу не удается разгадать загадку таинственного пациента, который охотно и весьма убедительно доказывает всем свое внеземное происхождение и заранее назначает дату своего возвращения на Ка-Пэкс. Вскоре Марка Пауэлла, так и не сумевшего приоткрыть тайну личности своего самого удивительного подопечного, начинает тревожить невероятная, но навязчивая мысль: может быть, Прот вовсе не сумасшедший и в его словах есть доля правды...

programme.title: Мне по кайфу
programme.desc: Жаку скоро 50, но вместо приземлённых занятий и работы от заката до рассвета (как делают все его знакомые и родные) он одержим идеей разбогатеть, причём серьёзно и по-быстрому. И его совершенно не смущает тот факт, что пока всё, что у него есть, – это кипенно-белый халат и тапочки.

Тут же ему в голову приходит необычный план по трудоустройству сестры.

Он зовет себя Протом и утверждает, что его родина – далекая планета Ка-Пэкс, откуда он мгновенно перенесся на Землю в луче света.
